channel.title: NPR Topics: Business
channel.description: Find the latest business news with reports on Wall Street, interest rates, banking, companies, and U.S. and world financial markets. Subscribe to the Business Story of the Day podcast.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: As political winds shift, top chipmaker TSMC looks beyond Taiwan
item.description: The lifeblood of Silicon Valley — advanced microchips — pumps from a science park on Taiwan's west coast, mostly from TSMC, the world's biggest chipmaker. But now the company is looking abroad for places to grow.
item.content:encoded:
The lifeblood of Silicon Valley — advanced microchips — pumps from a science park on Taiwan's west coast, mostly from TSMC, the world's biggest chipmaker. But now the company is looking abroad for places to grow.

(Image credit: John Ruwitch/NPR)
item.dc:creator: John Ruwitch

item.title: Supreme Court weighs copyright fight between music industry and internet providers
item.description: At issue is whether internet providers can be liable for their users' committing copyright violations using its services.
item.content:encoded:
At issue is whether internet providers can be liable for their users' committing copyright violations using its services.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Alyssa Kapasi

item.title: Experts share tips on how to maximize your dollars during holiday shopping
item.description: The holiday shopping season is upon us. We share some tips from pros on how to get the most for your dollars.
item.content:encoded: The holiday shopping season is upon us. We share some tips from pros on how to get the most for your dollars.
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: Airbus calls for 'immediate' software upgrade to A320 aircraft
item.description: A320 planes are flown by a number of domestic and international airlines, and the required software update could lead to "operational disruptions to passengers and customers," according to Airbus.
item.content:encoded:
A320 planes are flown by a number of domestic and international airlines, and the required software update could lead to "operational disruptions to passengers and customers," according to Airbus.

(Image credit: Daniel Slim)
item.dc:creator: Sarah Ventre

item.title: This expert watches shoppers like a hawk. Here's her holiday forecast
item.description: Retail expert Katie Thomas scours her local shopping mall in Pittsburgh to divine what Americans' shopping habits reveal about the economy and the nation's future.
item.content:encoded:
Retail expert Katie Thomas scours her local shopping mall in Pittsburgh to divine what Americans' shopping habits reveal about the economy and the nation's future.

(Image credit: Nate Smallwood)
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: Why kids are leading the charge back to movie theatres
item.description: PG-rated movies are leading the drive back to theaters following COVID, and the film industry has kids to thank!
item.content:encoded: PG-rated movies are leading the drive back to theaters following COVID, and the film industry has kids to thank!
item.dc:creator: Kai McNamee

item.title: Federal cuts and uncertainty threaten Maryland's biotech industry
item.description: Federal cuts to scientific research have damped economic hopes for what was Maryland's growing bio-health sector. More than 5,000 jobs have been lost.
item.content:encoded: Federal cuts to scientific research have damped economic hopes for what was Maryland's growing bio-health sector. More than 5,000 jobs have been lost.
item.dc:creator: Jenny Abamu

item.title: 4 marketing tricks to not fall for this holiday season
item.description: Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gimmicks with these tips.
item.content:encoded:
Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gimmicks with these tips.

(Image credit: Mininyx Doodle)
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: How to watch the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
item.description: The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.
item.content:encoded:
The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.

(Image credit: Eugene Gologursky)
item.dc:creator: Ivy Buck

item.title: The U.S. produces a lot of food waste. This place wants to address it
item.description: Even amid rising grocery prices and increased sensitivity to environmental issues, Americans still trash once-edible food at alarming rates.
item.content:encoded:
Even amid rising grocery prices and increased sensitivity to environmental issues, Americans still trash once-edible food at alarming rates.

(Image credit: Keren Carrion)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise
